entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmppprt4b_7/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0046.6842] The element CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect (Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect) does not include EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquivalents (Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents) as defined in the US GAAP Taxonomy.
However, in the companies extension taxonomy CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect includes EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquivalents as a summation-child. Consider using either CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecrease or CashPeriodIncreaseDecrease, instead of CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect.
Rule Element Id:6842 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
